text: Simon Alan Gregory (born 2 October 1974), better known by his stage name, Simon Gregson, is an English actor, known for his role as Steve McDonald in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he has played continuously since December 1989. He has received 17 awards for comedy and performance, plus a Legends of Industry Award.
